name: Planet infinity
description: Planet infinity (PLI) seeks to leverage the advantages of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology to give back to society in a way that has not been fully exploited. PLI hosted on BSC – is a platform that features tokenized Digital creatures (NFTs) in a virtual universe (metaverse). Planet Infinity (PLI) aims to be the first ecosystem to combine the thrill of gaming and the value of digital collectibles, transforming it into the digital creature’s universe. PLI will make use of a nextlevel NFT- based gameplay and integrate it with a blockchain-based decentralized financial system, making the game not only for fun but also an investment & daily earn (play-to- earn / stake-to-earn concept)
